title: Little Snitch v3.3 [Zeus Downloads]
description:
Little Snitch v3.3
-------------------------------------------
Official Web Site: http://www.obdev.at/products/littlesnitch/


Installation Instructions: 
------------------
- Disconnect from the internet. Turn OFF your WiFi and disconnect any ethernet cable connected to your mac.
- Open "LittleSnitch v3.3.dmg"
- Open "Little Snitch Installer.app" and then install Little Snitch. Your mac's password may be required during the installation, enter it and then click on "OK".
- After the installation, Little Snitch will ask you to restart your mac. Click on "Restart Now". Your mac will now restart.
- After the restart, open the "Rules ...", create a new rule denying outgoing connections and write in the bar "Little Snitch Agent" (if you try to search in your applications, you won't find because it's hidden), then press ok.
- Duplicate the rule and modify outgoing connections with incoming connections.
- Make the same with "Little Snitch Configuration", "Little Snitch Network Monitor" and "Little Snitch Software Update".
- For safety, create a new rule and deny outgoing connections to the hostname "wtf.odbev.at".
- From the top-menu bar click on "Little Snitch Configuration" (it will be next to the apple logo). Then click on "Register...".
- A new window will come up asking you for the Little Snitch license data. Enter a fake name in the "Owner" field (any fake name will work).
- Open "Serial.txt" file that is included with your download. Copy the serial number and paste it in the "License Key" field in the Little Snitch window, then click on "OK".
- Enjoy.


Important Note: 
------------------
- Don't update Little Snitch.


Support The Developers. If You Like It, Buy It.
--------------------------------------------------
Seeding and positive comments are highly appreciated.


Why join the Navy, if you can be a pirate?  - Steve Jobs
